DataElement.preferredName: Breast Lymphedema Symptom Survey Last Seven Days How Much Have Pain Tenderness or Discomfort in Breast Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of how often in the last seven days they have or had pain, tenderness, or discomfort in their breast, using an eleven point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Breast Lymphedema Symptom Survey Last Seven Days How Much Have Pain Tenderness or Discomfort in Breast Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to measure the degree of distress associated with the signs and symptoms of lymphedema in an operated breast._The most recent week, including today._How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A question about whether an individual has or had pain, tenderness or discomfort in their breast._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to measure the degree of distress associated with the signs and symptoms of lymphedema in an operated breast.

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to measure the degree of distress associated with the signs and symptoms of lymphedema in an operated breast.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Quantity Have Pain, Tenderness or Discomfort in Breast Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:A question about whether an individual has or had pain, tenderness or discomfort in their breast.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.
How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.

Concepts.longName: Have Pain, Tenderness, or Discomfort in Breast
Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had pain, tenderness or discomfort in their breast.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: BLSS:Breast Lymphedema Symptom Survey, Degnim, A., 2012
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for Alliance per request by K.Allen-Ziegler. mc 4/3/13  Approved by Katie and released. mc 4/15/13

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11_The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: A 1 on an eleven-point scale from Not at all to A lot

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A 1 on an eleven-point scale from Not at all to A lot
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective answer of non-agreement.: Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.: A subjective answer of strong agreement.: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11: The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.: A subjective score of 1 on a Likert scale.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.
Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement.
A subjective answer describing a great amount or extent.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The difference between the lowest and highest numerical values; the limits or scale of variation.
A subjective score of 1 on a Likert scale.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::11:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: How much there is of something that you can measure; the total amount or number.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
